title: Top Places to visit in Rupnagar, Punjab
content: Rupnagar district is one of twenty-two districts in the state of Punjab, India. The town of Rupnagar (formerly known as Rupar or Ropar) is said to have been founded by a Raja called Rokeshar, who ruled during the 11th century and named it after his son Rup Sen.
